member.name: T:Service.Controllers.AuthenticationController
member.summary: Authentication Controller - Manages user authentication, session management, and password operations
Authentication Controller - Manages user authentication, session management, and password operations

member.name: M:Service.Controllers.AuthenticationController.GetCompanyInfo
member.summary: Gets company information with license warnings (no authentication required)
member.returns: Company information including name, server time, and license warnings
member.response: Returns company information with license warnings
If a server error occurs

member.name: M:Service.Controllers.AuthenticationController.Login(Core.DTOs.General.LoginRequest)
member.summary: Authenticates a user with password-only login
member.param: The login request containing password
member.returns: Session information with JWT token and user details
member.response: Returns session info with token and user details
If warehouse selection is required or device registration details are needed
If the password is invalid or account is disabled
If a server error occurs
member.remarks: This endpoint uses password-only authentication. The system automatically identifies the user. Sets an HTTP-only cookie for session management and returns a JWT token for API access.

member.name: M:Service.Controllers.AuthenticationController.ChangePassword(Core.DTOs.Settings.ChangePasswordRequest)
member.summary: Changes the password for the authenticated user
member.param: The password change request containing current and new passwords
member.returns: Success message if password change was successful
member.response: Returns success message
If the current password is incorrect
If the user is not authenticated or token is invalid
If a server error occurs
member.remarks: Requires authentication. The user ID is extracted from the JWT token. Both current password verification and new password validation are performed.

member.name: M:Service.Controllers.AuthenticationController.Logout
member.summary: Logs out the authenticated user and clears session
member.returns: Success message if logout was successful
member.response: Returns success message
If the user is not authenticated
If a server error occurs
member.remarks: Clears the session from the server-side session manager and removes the HTTP-only cookie. The JWT token becomes invalid after logout.

member.name: M:Service.Controllers.AuthenticationController.GetLicenseStatus
member.summary: Gets license status information
member.returns: License status details
member.response: Returns license status
If a server error occurs
